channel.description: Recent content in geolocation on Orange

item.title: Data Mining for Archaeologists, part II
item.description: This is the second part of a blog on archaeological data analysis in Orange. In the first part, we wrote about image analytics and how to predict amphora types. This blog will show a simpler analysis, where we will plot excavation sites onto maps and interpret the results. Related: Data Mining for Archaeologists, part I This time we will be working with the pottery data from the Antikythera Survey Project. You can download the data (pottery.
